data.message: Damn such negativity from some in here, I guess your opinions, I mean judgments, only matter if anyone cares enough ... Personally I think Eminem is evolving beautifully, he’s 45 years old, I can’t speak for him and it’s not my place to but I’m nearly 50 and I’ve been a fan since he first hit our screens, I feel like instead of criticising him for one performance, his appearance, age and whatever else inclusive of political opinions, just leave him be ... I don’t follow someone I’m not really in to as it makes no sense, I’ve better things to do with my time ... My impression is he’s not the same person he was all those years ago when Slim Shady was created, it’s up to him whether he chooses to bring him back or not ... We all age, mature and change as we grow older and Eminem is evolving as he’s growing older ... Who decided there’s an age limit now to rappers? Do you not listen properly to the lyrics in his songs? There’s a massive difference between hearing and truly listening, seeing and truly watching ... Living and learning
